stories.text: Wondering if anyone here on HN has strong views on Rivian. Tesla vs. Rivian, Amazon's stake/electric fleet, and just the company in general and its valuation. IIRC it isn't a remote friendly company, which I saw as a major con for SWE when I interviewed there awhile back. But I'm interested in hearing more about what people think of the company in general.
stories.title: Ask HN: What's Your Opinion on Rivian?

stories.title: Ask HN: Banned and Unbanned by YouTube Repeatedly

stories.text: I'm wondering what the sweet spot is nowadays as I know a couple of startups delivering video content, and at a glance it seems this is costing them more to do than it should through the Paas options they are using. I would have thought this would have improved a lot in the 10-15 years since I last looked at it seriously. I'm hoping some here know how this ought to be done on modern cloud services to enable delivering in-app videos cost effectively to large numbers of viewers. thanks!
stories.title: Ask HN: What is the most economic and scalable way to host videos in 2022?
